channel.title: How Do You Disable Spawning While Being Attacked!
channel.description: Well Im coding this spawn server and i want it to be a spawn server where u can do ::item and get the item but how do i make it so that if u are being attacked by a npc or in general anything that is attacking u, u cant spawn anything in, atm when u are fighting a npc u can spawn, in the wildy u cant, so i how can i make it so that if u are fighting a npc you are not aloud to spawn

item.title: How Do You Disable Spawning While Being Attacked!
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

use an if block

Read full topic
item.source: How Do You Disable Spawning While Being Attacked!

item.title: How Do You Disable Spawning While Being Attacked!
item.dc:creator: @khayam khayam
item.description:
@khayam wrote:

well you havent told me wat revision you are working on, but since im working on 718+'s il give you a code that you can use:

[sup] if (player.getAttackedByDelay() + 10000 > Utils.currentTimeMillis()) {
player.getPackets().sendGameMessage(
“You can’t do this while you’re under combat.”);
return;
}[/sup]

if your using a different revision then your going to have to convert it

Read full topic
item.source: How Do You Disable Spawning While Being Attacked!
